dt: {bc}one who takes part in dialogue or conversation
{bc}a man in the middle of the line in a minstrel show who questions the end men and acts as leader

et: Latin {it}interloqui{/it} to speak between, issue an interlocutory decree, from {it}inter-{/it} + {it}loqui{/it} to speak
shortdef: one who takes part in dialogue or conversation
a man in the middle of the line in a minstrel show who questions the end men and acts as leader
